Subject: Data Backup Unsuccessful

Last night, the medical data backup experienced an error, likely because of storage limitations You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. After restarting the backup server and reviewing the logs, the problem still exists. Kindly help me address this issue. My name is Jane Smith.
